Hostodo Returns with Free DirectAdmin Licenses and Lots of Bandwidth in Las Vegas! (Starting at $19.99/year!)

directadmin, hostodo, las vegas March 22, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome back, Hostodo!  We haven’t seen you since December 11, 2019.  They’re active on LowEndTalk and I’m happy to see them on LEB again.

They’re bringing a nice offer this time:

  • 1GB VPS in Las Vegas with free DirectAdmin Server license and 4TB of transfer for $29.99/year!
  • Other offers start at $19.99/year and go up to incldue 2GB and 3GB plans as well!

If you’ve got a big web operation – as a host, a reseller, or just your own projects – and want a lot of bandwidth, this might be the offer for you!

Also, check out their mass-ordering API below.  Sounds really cool and something I’ve never seen elsewhere.

They are registered in the USA. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Credit Card, PayPal, Cryptocurrencies, AliPay.  You can read reviews of them on TrustPilot.

Here’s a little about Hostodo in their own words:

“Hello all! This is Hassan, software engineer and founder of Hostodo.com.

Hostodo has been active on LEB and LET since our inception in late 2014. We are rock solid. We have witnessed many of our friends and foes perish throughout the years while we have steadily grown. The key to our growth and stability is that we focus exclusively on virtual servers and thus that is our main priority. Our NVMe line of KVM VPS’s deploy high speed PCI based NVMe drives to ensure optimal performance. Freebies such as free DirectAdmin Standard and CloudFlare integration within our platform are available for convenience.’
It goes without saying that we are a professional provider, we own and colocate all of our hardware and (most) of our IP space. This is important because we have much more control over our infrastructure and can quickly resolve issues on our own.

P.S. Ask us about our mass ordering API which is currently in beta! We allow you to place an order for 10s or 100s of VPS’s in one API request, allowing you to specify custom server hostnames/labels with auto-incrementing numeric suffixes.”

The LEB community thrives on reports from our readers about the companies they patronize, so please comment below about your experience with Hostodo.
